essential_columns.name: DESTINATION_ORGANIZATION_ID
essential_columns.reason: mandatory for joining with mtl_system_items or org_organization_definitions

columns.name: ACCRUAL_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.desc: Unique identifier for the General Ledger accrual account.

columns.name: ACCRUE_ON_RECEIPT_FLAG
columns.desc: Indicates whether items are accrued upon receipt (Y/N).

columns.name: ACCRUED_FLAG
columns.desc: Indicates if the distribution is accrued (received but not yet billed).

columns.name: AMOUNT_BILLED
columns.desc: Amount invoiced by Oracle Payables against the distribution.

columns.name: AWARD_ID
columns.desc: Award identifier for grants or funded projects.

columns.name: BUDGET_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.desc: Unique identifier for the General Ledger budget account.

columns.name: CODE_COMBINATION_ID
columns.desc: Expense account (joins with GL_CODE_COMBINATIONS for account code).

columns.name: DESTINATION_CONTEXT
columns.desc: Protected descriptive flexfield context for destination details.

columns.name: DESTINATION_ORGANIZATION_ID
columns.desc: This is inventory organization that must be joined with organization id of mtl_system_items or org_organization_definitions

columns.name: DESTINATION_TYPE_CODE
columns.desc: Final destination type (e.g., INVENTORY, EXPENSE, SHOP FLOOR).

columns.name: PO_DISTRIBUTION_ID
columns.desc: Primary key; unique identifier of the distribution.

columns.name: QUANTITY_RECOUPED
columns.desc: Units for which prepayments have been liquidated.

columns.name: SOURCE_DISTRIBUTION_ID
columns.desc: Source distribution ID (for planned distributions copied to releases).

key_columns.name: ACCRUAL_ACCOUNT_ID
key_columns.desc: Unique identifier for the General Ledger accrual account.

key_columns.name: ACCRUE_ON_RECEIPT_FLAG
key_columns.desc: Indicates whether items are accrued upon receipt (Y/N).

key_columns.name: ACCRUED_FLAG
key_columns.desc: Indicates if the distribution is accrued (received but not yet billed).

key_columns.name: AMOUNT_BILLED
key_columns.desc: Amount invoiced by Oracle Payables against the distribution.

key_columns.name: AWARD_ID
key_columns.desc: Award identifier for grants or funded projects.

notes: The PO_DISTRIBUTIONS_ALL table provides accounting-level detail for each purchase order line shipment. Each distribution breaks down accounting, funding, and destination details for a portion of the PO line, supporting both encumbrance and accrual accounting. Key roles include budgetary control, receiving and invoicing, project accounting, and inventory/expense purchases. Common use cases include querying PO spend per accounting code, tracking open commitments, and linking distributions to GL entries. The table tracks quantities (ordered, received, billed, etc.) and amounts. It is often joined with GL, PO headers/lines/locations, and project modules.
